gameshop.advance.controller

Class BookControllerSingleton

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • gameshop.advance.controller.BookControllerSingleton
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRemoteClient, IRemoteBookClient, IRemoteReservationClient, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote

    public class BookControllerSingleton
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements IRemoteBookClient, IRemoteReservationClient
    Controller lato client delle funzioni relative alle prenotazioni.
    See Also:
